name: Aripiprazole

dosing.adult_acute: Schizophrenia: 10-15 mg/day. Bipolar mania: 15 mg/day. Augmentation: 2-15 mg/day
dosing.adult_maintenance: 10-30 mg/day for psychosis. 2-10 mg/day for augmentation
dosing.notes: Partial D2 agonist. Can be activating. LAI available.

warnings: Lower metabolic risk vs other SGAs
